title: Spicy lamb curry
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '6 dried red chilli peppers (preferably Kashmiri)', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 clove garlic, coarsely chopped - or more to taste', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons ginger-garlic paste', '5 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1kg lamb stew pieces', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '700ml water', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander']
